_header: Why shouldest thou die for man so ill
Title(s): Dialogue between the Child Jesus and the Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, Dialogue between the Child Jesus and the Virgin Mary — ten quatrains (abab) plus burden (cbcb): ‘Shall I dere moder as I wille / Dere moder shall I soo / Shalle I take deth for manne so ille / And suffre payne and woo’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Why shuldest thou die for manne so illWhy shuldest thou sonne doo
                    so…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…We ii in fere in blisse so clereWille be where is noo
                    woo
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 233-4.
